welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Kin, Japan! Known for its serene natural beauty and rich cultural heritage, this charming city is ready to enchant you. Enjoy your stay and immerse yourself in all that Kin has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kadena AB Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Kadena AB Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the WiFi network for free by entering their email address.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Iejima Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Iejima Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free wifi network.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Naha Airport handles both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Domestic Terminal
terminals.description: The domestic terminal at Naha Airport is used for flights within Japan.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Naha Airport is used for flights to and from other countries.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
